summary: AI voice cover app: User uploads a song, AI applies user's voice to cover it, then mixes and masters the vocals with the song. The app must be totally free.
architectural_notes: App must be completely free with no paid features or subscriptions
Needs audio processing pipeline for mixing and mastering
Must handle audio file uploads (likely MP3, WAV formats)
Must support multiple export formats (MP3, WAV)
Requires AI music composition/generation capability for creating songs from lyrics
Needs text input processing for lyrics
Requires local storage or database for song library persistence
Needs persona management system to store multiple voice profiles
Requires audio player component for in-app playback
known_issues: Creative songs and covers are not being saved to the library after generation/processing completes

existing_features.title: Implement voice recording feature allowing users to record their voice samples directly in the browser using the Web Audio API
Implement voice upload feature allowing users to upload pre-recorded voice samples in common audio formats (MP3, WAV, M4A)
Implement song upload feature allowing users to upload songs in common audio formats (MP3, WAV, M4A) that will be covered
Implement export and download feature allowing users to download the final mixed and mastered track
Implement processing status UI showing real-time progress for voice analysis, vocal synthesis, mixing, and mastering stages

Design a creative, coherent visual theme with a modern music production aesthetic featuring warm gradients, dynamic waveform visualizations, and clean typography that emphasizes the professional audio processing capabilities
Add format selection UI (MP3 or WAV) to the download interface, allowing users to choose their preferred audio format before downloading the final track
Update DownloadButton component to support downloading in either MP3 or WAV format based on user selection, converting the audio blob accordingly
Create lyrics input UI component allowing users to type or paste song lyrics into a text area with character count and validation
Implement full song generation workflow that accepts user lyrics and voice sample, then generates a complete song with music and vocals using the user's voice characteristics
Update application workflow to support two modes: cover mode (upload existing song) and generation mode (create song from lyrics), with appropriate UI navigation and state management
Create frontend Library component displaying all saved songs in a grid or list view with song title, artist, creation date, and thumbnail/waveform visualization
Create frontend Personas component allowing users to create, name, view, and delete voice personas, with UI to select a persona when starting a new song creation workflow
Implement in-app audio playback component with play/pause controls, progress bar, and volume control for playing completed songs directly in the browser
Update Library component to include both play and download actions for each song, integrating the audio player and existing DownloadButton component
Update App.tsx workflow to integrate library and personas navigation, allowing users to access library view and manage personas from the main interface
Fix audio playback issue causing downloaded files to not play correctly by ensuring proper audio encoding and MIME type settings in DownloadButton component

Update App.tsx workflow to allow users to select a persona from the Personas view before starting either cover mode or generation mode, then immediately navigate to the appropriate workflow (song upload for cover, lyrics input for generation) with the selected persona pre-associated
Add social media sharing functionality to the Library component, providing buttons or menu options to share/upload songs directly to Facebook and YouTube platforms
Implement Facebook sharing integration that opens Facebook's share dialog with the song file and metadata (title, artist) for posting to the user's Facebook feed or page
Implement YouTube upload integration that allows users to upload their generated songs directly to their YouTube channel with title, description, and privacy settings
Remove any automatic download triggers that occur immediately after song processing or generation completes in both cover mode and generation mode workflows
Ensure that completed songs from both cover and generation workflows are automatically saved to the library and users are navigated to the Library view to access them

Add a text input field to the lyrics generation workflow (GenerationMode component) where users can describe the desired music style and characteristics for their song (e.g., '808 beats with Auto-Tune and deep bass')

Display suggested music style keywords (such as '808', 'Auto-Tune', 'deep bass', 'male voice', 'female voice', 'reverb', 'distortion', 'trap', 'R&B', 'pop', 'rock') as clickable tags or chips that users can click to insert into their style prompt
Update the GenerationMode component to submit the style prompt value along with lyrics when calling the backend submitLyricsRequest function

Update the LyricsInput component to remove the maximum character limit validation (currently 2,000 characters), allowing users to enter unlimited lyrics text while keeping the minimum 20 character requirement
Debug and fix the library saving mechanism in App.tsx to ensure songs are correctly saved to the backend after both cover mode and generation mode processing completes
Add error handling and logging to the library save workflow to capture and display any errors that prevent songs from being saved to the library

Debug and fix the App.tsx workflow to ensure that all songs created through cover mode (song upload workflow) are correctly saved to the backend library with complete metadata (title, artist, creation date, audio blob, voice sample ID) after processing completes

Debug and fix the App.tsx workflow to ensure that all songs created through generation mode (lyrics-based generation workflow) are correctly saved to the backend library with complete metadata (title, artist, creation date, audio blob, voice sample ID) after processing completes
Add comprehensive error handling and user-facing error messages in App.tsx for library save failures, displaying toast notifications when songs fail to save to the library
Ensure that all saved songs in the library are immediately playable using the AudioPlayer component without requiring page refresh or additional actions

Add logging statements throughout the library save workflow in App.tsx to track the complete flow from processing completion through backend save call to library navigation, including all intermediate state changes and function calls
Investigate the root cause of the deployment failure by examining deployment logs, build output, and any error messages from the Internet Computer canister deployment process
Fix any frontend build errors that may be preventing the frontend assets from being compiled and deployed to the Internet Computer asset canister

Debug and fix the library save mechanism in App.tsx by examining the handleProcessingComplete and handleGenerationComplete callback functions to identify why songs are not being saved to the backend after cover mode processing completes

Debug and fix the library save mechanism in App.tsx by examining the handleProcessingComplete and handleGenerationComplete callback functions to identify why songs are not being saved to the backend after generation mode processing completes
Verify that the backend actor's createCover function is being called with complete and correct parameters (songId, voiceSampleId, audio blob) from the useProcessingStatus hook's final step

Add comprehensive console logging throughout App.tsx to track the complete library save workflow including: when processing completes, what data is passed to save functions, backend actor call results, and navigation to library view

Ensure that after both cover mode and generation mode complete, the application automatically navigates to the Library view and the newly created song appears in the library list without requiring page refresh
Add error toast notifications in App.tsx that display user-friendly error messages when songs fail to save to the library, including specific details about what went wrong

new_feature_requests.summary: Voice recording/upload feature to capture user's voice
Song upload feature to accept audio files
AI voice synthesis to apply user's voice to the uploaded song
Mixing and mastering feature to blend AI-generated vocals with the song
Export/download feature for the final mixed track
Implement AI voice synthesis backend logic that analyzes the user's voice sample and applies voice characteristics to cover the uploaded song's vocals
Implement mixing and mastering backend logic that blends the AI-generated vocals with the instrumental track of the uploaded song
Allow users to choose MP3 or WAV format when downloading the final track
Add lyrics input feature allowing users to type in lyrics
Implement full song generation from user-provided lyrics using the user's voice (AI music composition)
Add backend data model to store user-provided lyrics as text associated with a cover or song generation request
Add backend function to handle lyrics-based song generation requests, storing the request parameters (voice sample ID, lyrics text) and returning a generated cover ID
Create in-app library to store all generated/covered songs
Implement persona system to save multiple voice profiles with different voices
Add in-app audio playback feature for completed songs in the library
Create backend data model to store a library of all generated and covered songs, including metadata (title, artist, creation date, mode type), associated voice sample ID, and audio blob reference
Create backend data model for voice personas, allowing users to save multiple voice profiles with names and associated voice sample IDs
Update backend song creation functions (both cover and generation workflows) to automatically add completed songs to the user's library upon successful processing
Integrate persona selection with cover and generation workflows so users choose a persona before uploading a song or writing lyrics
Add social media sharing/upload functionality to library, allowing users to upload songs directly to Facebook, YouTube, and other platforms
Update backend song creation functions (createCover and createLyricsRequest) to automatically save all completed songs to the user's library without requiring manual save action
Remove automatic download after song completion; songs should only be saved to library until user explicitly chooses to download or upload
Add prompt/style input box for lyrics generation mode where users can specify music style/characteristics (e.g., 808, Auto-Tune, deep bass, male voice)
Add suggested keyword/tag UI showing common music style keywords (808, Auto-Tune, deep bass, male voice, etc.) that users can click to add to their prompt
Update the backend LyricsRequest data model to include an optional stylePrompt field of type Text to store the user's music style description
Update the backend submitLyricsRequest function to accept and store the stylePrompt parameter in the LyricsRequest record
Remove character limit on lyrics input, allowing unlimited characters

Verify that the backend createCover and submitLyricsRequest functions are correctly storing completed songs with all required metadata (title, artist, creation date, audio blob reference, voice sample ID)
Verify that the backend actor's saveToLibrary or equivalent function correctly persists song records to stable storage and returns success confirmation
Fix any backend compilation errors in main.mo or migration.mo that may be preventing successful canister deployment
Verify that dfx.json configuration is correct and all canister declarations match the actual project structure
Ensure successful deployment of both backend and frontend canisters to the Internet Computer network
Verify that the backend actor's submitLyricsRequest function is correctly storing lyrics-based song generation requests and that the generated songs are being persisted to the library storage
